# Function reference {.doc .doc-index}

## Estimation Functions

User facing estimation functions


| | |
| --- | --- |
| [estimation.feols](estimation.feols.qmd#pyfixest.estimation.feols) | Estimate linear regression models with fixed effects using fixest formula syntax. |
| [estimation.fepois](estimation.fepois.qmd#pyfixest.estimation.fepois) | Estimate Poisson regression models with fixed effects using the `pplmhdfe` algorithm. |
| [did.estimation.did2s](did.estimation.did2s.qmd#pyfixest.did.estimation.did2s) | Estimate a Difference-in-Differences model using Gardner's two-step DID2S estimator. |
| [did.estimation.lpdid](did.estimation.lpdid.qmd#pyfixest.did.estimation.lpdid) | Estimate a Difference-in-Differences / Event Study Model via the Local Projections Approach. |
| [did.estimation.event_study](did.estimation.event_study.qmd#pyfixest.did.estimation.event_study) | Estimate a treatment effect using an event study design. |

## Summarize and Visualize

Post-Processing of Estimation Results


| | |
| --- | --- |
| [summarize.summary](summarize.summary.qmd#pyfixest.summarize.summary) | Summary |
| [summarize.etable](summarize.etable.qmd#pyfixest.summarize.etable) | Create an esttab-like table from a list of models. |
